front.title: Joint IETF and ITU-T Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) Transport Profile process

abstract.t: The decision to develop a Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Transport Profile in cooperation between IETF and ITU-T does not fully defines and document process for development the required RFCs. This document complements the process as documented in the JWT decision with a couple of separate elements o An adaptation of the IETF working group process. o Identifies the expected participation in the process by the ITU-T. o A clarification of the decision rules regarding MPLS-TP documents. This document does not intend specify any ITU-T process, to the extent that is necessary it will be done according to ITU-T processes.
